column5: One **** of a benefit to loose.
SOOOO - no more "drinking up the profits", EH ?
The only loyalty is to the shareholder....that said, free beer for life? Nice perk........if only it was Moosehead or Kokanee........
I'll fix um I'm not drinking anymore Anheuser-Busch products.

This must be learned in HR hoses the employee class 101. I hear that at my workplace every time they slice away a benefit we have had for decades. "none of the competitors offer this benefit" Then the follow up by saying how much the care about the employees and that this is a family company. WHAT A CROCK
they will also no longer provide a free case of beer if you find a bottle with a mouse in it! what hosers.
First thing that came to my mind, eh.
What's the big deal..............my neighborhood tavern always has a big sign behind the bar saying........."FREE BEER TOMORROW" I can't wait until tomorrow............
